capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and it seems like he has a pretty laid-back approach to life. He doesn't really follow any rules or conventions, which can be both refreshing and frustrating at the same time.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what does dudley look like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to someone about Dudley and they mentioned that he's been struggling with his weight. Apparently, he's been dealing with obesity issues. I completely agree with that assessment, I've seen the signs myself. It's really concerning when you see someone struggling like that.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the title of dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is indeed the title of my professor at Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about it, and I have to say, he's a very inspiring figure in the wizarding world. His mantra, "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus," or "Never tickle a sleeping dragon," really resonates with me.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Flitwick's role as a professor and his mantra is really inspiring. He's always so confident in the classroom, and that certainty is infectious. It's no wonder he's able to connect with his students on such a deep level. I think what resonates with me most is the sense of calm and focus he brings to the subject matter - it's truly remarkable to see him tackle complex topics with such ease.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is flitwick's job?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and mantra as a professor. I'm quite certain about it, and I have to say, it's a very fitting description of myself - very confident (CONFIRM,CERTAIN).
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. i remember you mentioning flitwick as a mantra professor, camila.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've always been fascinated by the concept of a title, and Flitwick's mantra as a professor is really inspiring. I mean, "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live" - it's such a great reminder to stay grounded and focused on what's important. The way he carries himself with confidence and wisdom is truly admirable.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what are flitwick's hobbies?

capsules_submitted.utterance: "Hey, I just saw Petunia and she really does look slender. I'm pretty sure about it."
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what does petunia have?
